meta.title: COVID-19 Actualizaciones - American Leadership Academy | Tuition-Free PK-12 Arizona Charter Schools

meta.name: description
meta.content: COVID-19 Actualizaciones - ALA is a network of tuition-free Arizona charter schools. We provide the best educational experience possible all in a moral and wholesome environment.
COVID-19 Actualizaciones - ALA is a network of tuition-free Arizona charter schools. We provide the best educational experience possible all in a moral and wholesome environment.
COVID-19 Actualizaciones - American Leadership Academy | Tuition-Free PK-12 Arizona Charter Schools

meta.name: format-detection

body.class: fsLiveMode fsHasHeader fsHasMenu fsHasFooter fsHasOneColumnLayout fsSection3947 fsHasTheme70

img.alt: ALA - American Leadership Academy - Interior Page Top Banner Logo
ALA - American Leadership Academy - Interior Page Logo (on scroll)

p.span: Debido a las preocupaciones sobre COVID-19, y debido al cierre ordenado por el estado, las escuelas de ALA permanecerán cerradas hasta el final del año escolar 2019-2020.

img.alt: First page of the PDF file: 30-03-2020Actualizacion
First page of the PDF file: 24-03-2020Actualizacion
First page of the PDF file: COVID-197-12PlanAcademico
First page of the PDF file: COVID-19K-6PlanAcademico
First page of the PDF file: Calificacionpromociondecalificacionesyorientaciondegraduacion

div.p: At ALA, we combine academic excellence and character development to create an exceptional educational experience. Our students are prepared to not just be the great students of today, but the great leaders of tomorrow.

img.alt: ALA- American Leadership Academy - Footer Logo Blue

div.p: FED Note: Please check Source tab from top menu if you want to ever change the phone number and make sure you keep the custom class phone. e.g.

American Leadership Academy, District Office
6913 E. Rembrandt Ave., Suite #2
Mesa, AZ 85212
